summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2758, for the improvement of the alley in block 35, Capital Hill Addition, Division No. 5, being the alley between 21st Avenue North and 22nd Avenue North, from East Galer Street to East Highland Drive, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick or asphalt, laid upon a proper concrete foundation; under Ordinance No. 32963 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
